languages.text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
languages.original_text: Каждый четный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (второй, четвертый и т. д.) навигатор получает дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очко действия{/g}. Каждый нечетный ход (первый, третий и т. д.) навигатор получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Every even (second, fourth, etc) turn, the Navigator gains an additional action point. Every odd turn (first, third, etc) the Navigator gains +20 Perception.

Каждый четный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (второй, четвертый и т. д.) навигатор получает дополнительное очко действия. Каждый нечетный ход (первый, третий и т. д.) навигатор получает +20 к Восприятию.

languages.text: 每个偶数{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}（如第二、第四回合）开始时，导航者获得1点额外{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。每个奇数回合（如第一、第三回合）开始时，导航者获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每个偶数{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}（如第二、第四回合）开始时，导航者获得1点额外{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。每个奇数回合（如第一、第三回合）开始时，导航者获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。

languages.text: En cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} par (el segundo, el cuarto, etc.), el navegante gana 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} adicional. En cada turno impar (el primero, el tercero, etc.), el navegante gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

traits.locale_text: En cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} par (el segundo, el cuarto, etc.), el navegante gana 1 punto de acción adicional. En cada turno impar (el primero, el tercero, etc.), el navegante gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}.

languages.text: In jedem geraden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} (zweiter, vierter, etc.) erhält der Navigator einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g}. In jedem ungeraden Zug (erster, dritter, etc.) erhält der Navigator +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

traits.locale_text: In jeder geraden (zweiten, vierten, etc.) {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} erhält der Navigator einen zusätzlichen Aktionspunkt. In jeder ungeraden Runde (erste, dritte, etc.) erhält der Navigator +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} pair (deuxième, quatrième, etc.), le navigateur gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} supplémentaire. À chaque tour impair (premier, troisième, etc.), le navigateur bénéficie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

traits.locale_text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} pair (deuxième, quatrième, etc.), le Navigateur gagne un point d'action supplémentaire. À chaque tour impair (premier, troisième, etc.) le Navigateur bénéficie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

languages.text: 偶数（2ターン目、4ターン目…）{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに、航宙士は追加の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を得る。奇数（1ターン目、3ターン目…）ターンごとに、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}を+20獲得する。
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 偶数（2ターン目、4ターン目…）{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに、航宙士は追加の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を得る。奇数（1ターン目、3ターン目…）ターンごとに、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}を+20獲得する。

languages.text: Rotacı, her çift {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} (ikinci, dördüncü, vs.) ilave bir {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} kazanır. Rotacı, her tek turda (birinci, üçüncü, vs.) +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır.
languages.original_text: Every even {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (second, fourth, etc.), the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.), the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
